name: The Light Game
description:
This Game is Currently it's developing phase. So far, it's basically Bootleg Red light Green light but soon, there will be much more unique and original gameplay features.

Objective:

- Reach the flag at the end of the level

Promised Features in the Future:

- Obstacles

- Power ups

- Chest Rewards

- Cosmetics
